snippet: Eleven people, including four well-known lawyers representing families of Falun Gong adherents and other people held in one of China’s notorious “black jails,” have been detained in the northern province of Heilongjiang, the police say.
abstract: Eleven people, including four well-known lawyers representing families of Falun Gong adherents and other people held in one of China’s notorious “black jails,” have been detained in the northern province of Heilongjiang, the police say.

headline.main: 11 Detained After Protesting 'Black Jail' in China

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
